page.title: 04LIFESTYLE
page.content:
REBECCA LOFTUS
My clock radio wakes me up at 7:00am. Then I look through my books with my lamp on until 7:40am then I put on my red slippers and my red dressing gown. I go downstairs and wake my mum and dad up.Then my mum follows me into the kitchen.My brother is in the kitchen making his breakfast then I switch the radio on and get my breakfast.I have cornflakes coffee and toast after that I go upstairs,have a wash,brush my teeth and get dressed.At 8:40am I walk to school .It's not very far to walk there.At playtimes we play skipping.At home time I walk home .When I get home I say hello to my mum and I rush upstairs to watch T.V. At 6:00pm we have tea. After tea we watch T.V. until 9:00pm. I brush my teeth and go to bed.
